dublinCore.dc:title: S1348 ENR: Congressional Award Program Reauthorization Act of 2013
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.congress: One Hundred Thirteenth Congress of the United States of America
form.enrolled-dateline: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Thursday, the third day of January, two thousand and thirteen
form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES
form.official-title: To reauthorize the Congressional Award Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Congressional Award Program Reauthorization Act of 2013.
Section 108 of the Congressional Award Act (2 U.S.C. 808) is amended by striking October 1, 2013 and inserting October 1, 2018.
This Act shall take effect as of October 1, 2013.

attestation-group.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate
